[[File:Dactylitis.jpg|vignette|'''Dactylitis of the 2<sup>th</sup> toe''']]

question.title: What is dactylitis?
question.description: A condition characterized by inflammation of the digits

option_a.title: A type of arthritis
option_a.description: A condition that affects the joints

option_b.title: Inflammation of the digits
option_b.description: A condition that causes swelling and pain in the toes or fingers

option_c.title: A type of skin condition
option_c.description: A condition that affects the skin and mucous membranes

option_d.title: A type of injury
option_d.description: A condition that results from a physical trauma

correct_option.title: B
correct_option.description: The letter of the correct option
